Description: Essential guides for new users to set up and begin using Neo, including account creation, initial configuration, and basic navigation.

Submodules.Create Account: Step-by-step guide to creating your Neo account with email verification and profile setup.
Submodules.Dashboard Overview: Understanding the main dashboard layout, key metrics, and navigation elements.
Submodules.Initial Setup: Configure your workspace preferences, timezone settings, and notification options.
Submodules.Quick Start Guide: A fast-track tutorial to get you productive with Neo in under 10 minutes.

Description: Comprehensive documentation for managing your Neo account settings, security options, and profile information.

Submodules.Profile Settings: Update your personal information, avatar, display name, and contact details.
Submodules.Security Settings: Manage two-factor authentication, password changes, and security notifications.
Submodules.Billing Information: View and manage payment methods, billing addresses, and transaction history.
Submodules.Account Deletion: Process for permanently deleting your account and associated data.

Description: Features and tools for working effectively with team members, including permissions, sharing, and communication.

Submodules.Invite Team Members: Add new members to your workspace via email invitation or shareable links.
Submodules.Role Management: Assign and modify user roles including Admin, Editor, and Viewer permissions.
Submodules.Workspaces: Create and manage separate workspaces for different teams or projects.
Submodules.Activity Feed: Track team activity, changes, and updates in real-time.

Description: Connect Neo with third-party applications and services to extend functionality and automate workflows.

Submodules.Slack Integration: Connect Neo with Slack for notifications and quick actions from chat.
Submodules.Google Workspace: Sync with Google Calendar, Drive, and Gmail for seamless productivity.
Submodules.API Access: Documentation for Neo's REST API including authentication and endpoints.
Submodules.Webhooks: Set up webhooks to receive real-time notifications for events in Neo.
Submodules.Zapier Connection: Create automated workflows connecting Neo with 5000+ apps.

Description: Solutions to common issues and problems users may encounter while using Neo.

Submodules.Login Issues: Resolve problems with authentication, password reset, and account access.
Submodules.Sync Problems: Fix synchronization issues between devices and integrations.
Submodules.Performance Tips: Optimize Neo's performance with browser recommendations and cache management.
Submodules.Contact Support: How to reach the Neo support team for additional assistance.
